definition[0]: an official decision, especially one made by a court
example[0]: the recent Supreme Court ruling on defendants’ rights
definition[1]: the ruling group in a country or organization is the group that controls it
example[2]: the ruling body of American golf
definition[2]: a ruling interest or emotion interests someone more than anything else
example[3]: Football remains the ruling passion of many men.
example[4]: a district court ruling that the plaintiff’s medical evidence was unreliable
example[5]: The Commission must issue a final ruling by October.
